Text: victorvaz; Your horseshit about passwords and spamming surveys in the ettv discussion for this TWD episode actually inspired me. To download ettv's version that is, to check it, then to look up my ancient username and password for TPB and sign in just so I could say... fuck off, you weak-minded virus-infected son of a bitch. I've watched a number of shows uploaded by ettv and they are never substantially different in quality from eztv's good stuff, nor have I ever seen a password requestor nor a survey form pop up. Clean your fucking piece of shit computer asshole, and stop blaming others who do good works for your own lazy ways. If you're getting spamming crap popping up, guess what? You probably visited a Russian granny porn site or something and got a nasty old infection. Probably spread it to all your friends by email too. I bet you call tech support and yell at people in Bangladesh over issues you haven't even properly checked into on your PC. Amiright? Loser.

Yeah, he said thanks, and eztv always deserves thanks. I was pointing this out here deliberately, that his behavior in ettv's upload discussion regarding the same episode he's being an ass and that it's unwarranted. He spammed that thread with his nonsense, I'm attacking him in this one. Evening things out a bit.

Ive downloaded ettv files that turned out to be  password locked rar files requiring surveys to be filled out online to recieve the password. Before this I thought the claims were bullshit too and didnt understand what people were complaining about. And i can assure you Ive visited no russian porn sites etc lol. I steer clear of ettv now. sorry just speaking the truth.
@ leestrato. your full of shit buddy!
it's a straight video file, no rar no password.
This is the first time I have ever posted on PB..Thank U..I always look for ur downloads..They r the best and the fastest..Keep up the good work..:)
Uhh ettv did actually upload a rar asking me to visit some website which of course I'm not going to do. I've downloaded ettv before and similar stuff happened sooo fuck ettv. Eztv is the best!
hoorah, here we go! thx man :)
